channel.title: Spawn point & teleports
channel.description:
Hey, I was wondering where I can change my player spawn point when someone new logs in. Also, how can I change where teleports teleport to? I looked in player.java and couldn't find anything.
I'm using RiotScape source.

item.title: Spawn point & teleports
item.dc:creator: @brian9612 brian9612
item.description:
@brian9612 wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:6, topic:340004”][quote author=brian9612 link=topic=436381.msg3206030#msg3206030 date=1273819478]
ya but he asked for when YOU LOG IN THE FIRST TIME!!!

[/quote]
so uhh…
WHY THE HELL ARE YOU SHOUTING!!!

he asked for both of them, the spawn points and the teleports.
anyways if you want to change your span point, teleport to it (or just create a new player) and grab the co-ord values. then open player.java and search for them using ctrl+f. once you find them, change them as much as you want.

if you want to add teleports, just get the button’s ID (when you click on a teleport button and it says in your run.bat cmd “ID: XXXXX”) then add this in clckingmost.java:

case XXXXX:
toX = X co-ords;
toY = Y co-ords;
break;

or:

case XXXXX:
teleportToX = x co-ords;
teleportToY = y-co-ords;
break;

now if you want it as a command you can do

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) {
toX = XXXX;
toY = YYYY;
}

or

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) {
teleportToX = XXXX;
teleportToY = YYYY;
}

etc. also, next time please search in the tutorials section for crap like this…[/quote]
so uhh… why i shout cuz he need to read

Read full topic

item.title: Spawn point & teleports
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

brian9612:

ya but he asked for when YOU LOG IN THE FIRST TIME!!!

so uhh…
WHY THE HELL ARE YOU SHOUTING!!!

he asked for both of them, the spawn points and the teleports.
anyways if you want to change your span point, teleport to it (or just create a new player) and grab the co-ord values. then open player.java and search for them using ctrl+f. once you find them, change them as much as you want.

if you want to add teleports, just get the button’s ID (when you click on a teleport button and it says in your run.bat cmd “ID: XXXXX”) then add this in clckingmost.java:

case XXXXX:
toX = X co-ords;
toY = Y co-ords;
break;

or:

case XXXXX:
teleportToX = x co-ords;
teleportToY = y-co-ords;
break;

now if you want it as a command you can do

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) {
toX = XXXX;
toY = YYYY;
}

or

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) {
teleportToX = XXXX;
teleportToY = YYYY;
}

etc. also, next time please search in the tutorials section for crap like this…

Read full topic

item.title: Spawn point & teleports
item.dc:creator: @thunderflea thunderflea
item.description:
@thunderflea wrote:

oh cool
for a teleports, u need to make a command.
Ex
"if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“home”)) {
toX = XXXX;
toY = YYYY;
}
"
REPLACE THEE XXXX and YYYY with coordinites

item.title: Spawn point & teleports
item.dc:creator: @thunderflea thunderflea
item.description:
@thunderflea wrote:

ok spawn point is in player.java, search teleportToX
this is what one looks like
ex " teleportToX = 3254;//3072;
teleportToY = 3420;//3312;"
